body: s8 issue same SemClipboardManager.mContext and SemEmergencyManager

Could someone provide an hprof which highlights this issue?  I'm wondering if `com.samsung.android.content.clipboard.SemClipboardManager` extends `android.sec.clipboard.ClipboardUIManager`, given the similarity to the excluded ref [found here](https://github.com/square/leakcanary/blob/master/leakcanary-android/src/main/java/com/squareup/leakcanary/AndroidExcludedRefs.java#L342).

Here. [SemClipboardManager](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B6z6YKNoxslSekRSNVpYMW4zT2c)

and [SemEmergencyManager](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B6z6YKNoxslSMTVjRXNydWMtQmM)

those two issues are reported as a leak repeatedly in my application(Galaxy S8)
SemEmergencyManager leaking aswell in my app (Galaxy S6). Updated to Nougat last night
@davidevaliante are you seeing this in API 24 or 25?
